name: Adephesia
description:
" It has been a while since I've seen someone like you down here... "

Welcome to my very first game,  Adephesia!

Adephesia is a short pixelated horrific walk through the abyss. All the coding was made on the site Scratch.

!DOWNLOAD ON GITHUB!

OBJECTIVE:

You just... Walk. Just continue walking.
